column3:
Trying to identify the key facts, Ethan was suddenly aware he was looking at the wall clock; it was 7:35.
“Wait a minute. When did you hear about this?”
There was a tiny moment of hesitation. “The first news came in just before five.”

I told him that it was me and he said, "It’s 7.35 on a Sunday morning. This is terribly inconsiderate of you. I realize you’re besotted with Marigold, but you must try and restrain your passion. Come to lunch. I’ve got something to show you."
At 7:35 am Ishigami left his apartment as he did every weekday morning.
I looked at my watch. Seven thirty-five.
